item.description:
We will be meeting on MIT campus, close to the Kendall stop on the Red Line (subway). There is also plenty of free parking. We are in building E51, room 372.

Here is the URL for the MIT Map with the location of this building:
http://whereis.mit.ed...

This map shows the MBTA Kendall Stop:
http://whereis.mit.ed...
(the stop is in red on that map, and you can see E51 in the bottom right)

Here are the URL's for the parking lots:
http://whereis.mit.ed...
http://whereis.mit.ed...


We will have a presentation on getting a MySQL cluster up and running.

Pizza and soda will be served, so please RSVP accurately.
item.name: The Boston MySQL March Meetup
